panels.description: 当前集群的每秒请求数总量（包括全部读写请求）
panels.title: API QPS

panels.description: 每秒的修改请求的成功率
panels.title: Mutating Request Success Rate

panels.description: 集群内在处理的读请求总量
panels.title: Read InFlight Requests

panels.description: 集群内在处理的写请求总量
panels.title: Mutating InFlight Requests

panels.description: 因为写请求水位过高导致每秒拒绝请求的总量
panels.title: Dropped Requests Rate

targets.expr: histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb="GET",resource!=""}[$interval])) by (pod, verb, resource, scope, le))
histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb="LIST"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, verb, resource, scope, le))
histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb!~"GET|WATCH|LIST|CONNECT"}[$interval])) by (cluster, pod_name, verb, resource, scope, le))
